sentences.sentence: Inheriting from master.kid using py: extends.
Are you happy about the world that your daughter is inheriting?
sentences.translation: 关于你女儿所继承的世界，你高兴吗？

sentences.sentence: ON INHERITING: "Financial freedom can produce anxiety and hesitancy."
sentences.translation: 关于继承遗产：“财务自由会产生焦虑和踌躇。”
